panic_alerts.panic_error_alert: Sorry, emergency not triggered. You need to long press the button for 3 seconds
panic_alerts.panic_success_alert: A message has been sent to the security team.
panic_alerts.cancel_emergency_success_alert: You have successfully cancelled emergency request
panic_alerts.info: After pressing SOS, notifications will be sent out to our administrators and a member of our security team will speak to you.
panic_alerts.sos_disclaimer_body: Please use customer support or incident report form for non-emergencies.
panic_alerts.sos_feedback_body: Your Request for help has been submitted to our administrators and a member of our security team will speak to you soon.
panic_alerts.am_safe_feedback_body: We will let our administrators and our security team know your updated status.
panic_alerts.user_message: has initiated an emergency support request. Please confirm the person is safe and the emergency is resolved.
